Skills: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field.
Strong knowledge and experience in NSX-T (Network Virtualization and Security).
Proficiency in configuring and managing NSX-T Manager, Controllers, and Edge Nodes.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, handle multiple priorities, and meet deadlines.
